subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Matt Carle and Mike Grier scored midway through the first period, and Evgeni Nabokov made 34 saves to lead San Jose to a 2-0 victory over the Detroit Red Wings.
snippet: Matt Carle and Mike Grier scored midway through the first period, and Evgeni Nabokov made 34 saves to lead San Jose to a 2-0 victory over the Detroit Red Wings.
